# biggive-grid

A simple flexbox grid of anything!

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                              | Type                              | Default |
| -------------- | --------------- | ---------------------------------------- | --------------------------------- | ------- |
| `columnCount`  | `column-count`  |                                          | `number`                          | `3`     |
| `columnGap`    | `column-gap`    |                                          | `0 \| 1 \| 2 \| 3 \| 4 \| 5 \| 6` | `0`     |
| `spaceBelow`   | `space-below`   |                                          | `number`                          | `4`     |
| `spaceBetween` | `space-between` | Deprecated - should use columGap Instead | `boolean`                         | `false` |
